name: TheDumbOldMan
0:
”Alexa, ask the Dumb Old Man to say something”
”Alexa, ask the Dumb Old Man to give me advice”
”Alexa, ask the Dumb Old Man to complain”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the dumb old man
des: Ask the Dumb Old Man to say something and he will amaze you with his wisdom.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
